comment.author: Jesse
comment.text: When they let Muslims into our country they should ask them if they believe everything in their Quran and if they do Trumps people should tell people it says to kill all Christians and black people. Furthermore when Muslims came before Obama they came in in fewer numbers. Not tens of thousands sneaking across the border. If that's not enough, why is England and France now building walls to keep Muslims out?

replies.author: Joy
replies.text: This is new to me haha building walls

replies.author: Mark
replies.text: Britain is an island, explain the wall!
